pr_title: Header & Sidebar prep for dark mode

timeline.bodyText: Did you change the direction of the arrow because of the sidebar text shadow or maybe the new pinned style? I prefer the previous direction or no arrow in the context of the new pinned style.
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.bodyText: I removed the label for this case on purpose. I think it feels a little smoother, when we hide the label while clicking the button. Did you changed this n purpose?
timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.author: kyleknighted

timeline.bodyText: The navigation dropdowns have a different text color, can you unify them?
timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.bodyText: They look still different, but it is not a blocker for me, we can update them in a follow-up PR
replies.author: linuspahl

timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.bodyText: I love it! Thanks for the effort.
replies.author: linuspahl

timeline.bodyText: What do you think about adding the z-index to the theme config as well?
timeline.author: linuspahl

replies.bodyText: Yes, there is a plan to do that but just have not gotten to it yet
replies.author: kyleknighted

timeline.message: Increase height and add webkit prefix for CSS
More color tweaks, mainly for low res nav
